name: Cozy xmas
description:
Awesome music by: www.trashcatmusic.com

WASD -  movement

F - Interact

RMB - Ability 1

LMB - Ability 2

Space bar -  Ability 3

Q - Ability 4

Collect wood, fight some snowman, and keep your fire going. A lot of things till missing but thanks for playing!

Gameloop isn't fully implemented 
Game created for https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-40

Using Godot V3.4

Icons from https://game-icons.net/

Models / texture / programming: https://ncollie.itch.io/
